Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan and Shreyas Iyer scored fifties to help India reach 199/2
Sri Lanka wilted in the chase despite a half-century from Charith Asalanka
Ishan Kishan was named the Player of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: Ishan Kishan expressed his learning from the last few matches and his plan during the match
Rohit Sharma praised Ishan Kishan's performance and discussed Jadeja's role in the team
Dasun Shanaka acknowledged Sri Lanka's poor performance in all departments
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the tenth successive T20I win for India
